about_the_game: Deliver Company Clicker is a small game with a cozy atmosphere and main goal to unlock every upgrade while listening to a good music. You will look at different flags and unique customisation items and workers hired by you will bring you lots of money to buy everything. You will be able to unlock bird, ship, pearl and lots of other beautiful things, flags with some variants and you could upgrade your company by buying racks, or something to eat like chips or soda together with internet connection to increase your money per click.
detailed_description: Deliver Company Clicker is a small game with a cozy atmosphere and main goal to unlock every upgrade while listening to a good music. You will look at different flags and unique customisation items and workers hired by you will bring you lots of money to buy everything. You will be able to unlock bird, ship, pearl and lots of other beautiful things, flags with some variants and you could upgrade your company by buying racks, or something to eat like chips or soda together with internet connection to increase your money per click.
legal_notice: Delivery Company Clicker is a clicker in pixel art style, you could upgrade your main worker by buying snacks, chips soda and wi-fi for him, they will appear right to him. You could upgrade also your passive income, buying racks, workers, new storages and boxes in order to broaden your company. Also there are a possibility to unlock customisation such as unicorn toy, little ship and pearl and you could change your walls in different paints and hang some flags such as love or soviet there.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1,6 Hhz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shaders 1.1, 128mb
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
